com.android.calendarcommon2

Class ICalendar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.calendarcommon2.ICalendar

  • public class ICalendar
extends java.lang.Object
    Parses RFC 2445 iCalendar objects.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ICalendar.Component
      A component within an iCalendar (VEVENT, VTODO, VJOURNAL, VFEEBUSY, VTIMEZONE, VALARM).
      static class  ICalendar.FormatException
      Exception thrown when an iCalendar object has invalid syntax.
      static class  ICalendar.Parameter
      A parameter defined for an iCalendar property.
      static class  ICalendar.Property
      A property within an iCalendar component (e.g., DTSTART, DTEND, etc., within a VEVENT).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ICalendar.Component parseCalendar(java.lang.String text)
      Parses the provided text into an iCalendar object.
      static ICalendar.Component parseComponent(ICalendar.Component component, java.lang.String text)
      Parses the provided text, adding to the provided component.
      static ICalendar.Component parseComponent(java.lang.String text)
      Parses the provided text into an iCalendar component.
      static ICalendar.Component parseEvent(java.lang.String text)
      Parses the provided text into an iCalendar event.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • parseCalendar

        public static ICalendar.Component parseCalendar(java.lang.String text)
                                         throws ICalendar.FormatException
        Parses the provided text into an iCalendar object. The top-level component must be of type VCALENDAR.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to be parsed.
        Returns:
        The top-level VCALENDAR component.
        Throws:
        ICalendar.FormatException - Thrown if the text could not be parsed into an iCalendar VCALENDAR object.

      • parseEvent

        public static ICalendar.Component parseEvent(java.lang.String text)
                                      throws ICalendar.FormatException
        Parses the provided text into an iCalendar event. The top-level component must be of type VEVENT.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to be parsed.
        Returns:
        The top-level VEVENT component.
        Throws:
        ICalendar.FormatException - Thrown if the text could not be parsed into an iCalendar VEVENT.

      • parseComponent

        public static ICalendar.Component parseComponent(java.lang.String text)
                                          throws ICalendar.FormatException
        Parses the provided text into an iCalendar component.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to be parsed.
        Returns:
        The top-level component.
        Throws:
        ICalendar.FormatException - Thrown if the text could not be parsed into an iCalendar component.

      • parseComponent

        public static ICalendar.Component parseComponent(ICalendar.Component component,
                                                 java.lang.String text)
                                          throws ICalendar.FormatException
        Parses the provided text, adding to the provided component.
        Parameters:
        component - The component to which the parsed iCalendar data should be added.
        text - The text to be parsed.
        Returns:
        The top-level component.
        Throws:
        ICalendar.FormatException - Thrown if the text could not be parsed as an iCalendar object.
